description: {center:begin}{size: 25}Try tapping a Ki Sphere.{size}{center}

{center:begin}{size: 25}Goku is a {color : #FF9900}PHY Type{color} character, 
so by collecting the corresponding 
{color : #FF9900}orange Ki Spheres{color}, he will acquire 
double the usual amount of Ki.{size}{center}

{center:begin}{size: 25}In order to guard against Raditz's attack, 
swap Goku and Piccolo's positions.{size}{center}
{center:begin}{size: 25}First up, select a Training Location.{size}{center}

{center:begin}{size: 25}Next, select the Training Partners 
and Training Items.{size}{center}

{center:begin}{size: 25}This character is now at max level. 

Let's try Z-Awakening him.{size}{center}
